decision_conditions: This consent is valid for two years.Reason: In order that the nature of work pertaining to this consent remains appropriate.

The works hereby approved shall not exceed the previous pruning points and shall concern the lateral branches only. The works shall only be carried out strictly in accordance with British Standard 3998 [2010] 'Tree Works'.Reason: In the interests of the health, safety and appearance of the preserved trees.

Tree work should not be carried out during periods that are likely to interfere with or disturb breeding birds or mammals.Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of the Wildlife and Countryside Act (1981) and Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations (2010).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)

application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Works to an oak tree covered by condition 06 of approval TP/68/0473: 1x oak tree - Reduce height and spread by up to 2m, back to the previous set of pruning points.
